main event: A civilian man spotted a silvery, cigar-shaped object moving slowly over Tacoma, Washington on July 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared to be cigar-shaped and was moving slowly, disappearing behind clouds.
The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes.
The object was observed at an altitude of about 10-15,000 feet.
The object was observed by the wife of a reporter.
The weather conditions were very clear with unlimited visibility.
